slides.title: In Case of an Active Emergency
slides.content: Dial 112 — India's official emergency helpline. BIG BROTHER is not the police system; we are a bridge — built to help you and your loved ones stay connected and get help faster.

slides.title: Your Safety Comes First
slides.content: BIG BROTHER is your quiet companion — built for awareness, connection, and calm. Let's get you set up to stay that way.
